DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation APTIMA® HPV Assay Using PANTHER™ System
DOC.detailed_description: The APTIMA HPV Assay vitro nucleic acid amplification test qualitative detection E6/E7 viral messenger RNA ( mRNA ) 14 high-risk type human papillomavirus ( HPV ) cervical specimen . The high-risk HPV type detect assay include : 16 , 18 , 31 , 33 , 35 , 39 , 45 , 51 , 52 , 56 , 58 , 59 , 66 , 68 . The APTIMA HPV Assay discriminate 14 high-risk type . Cervical specimen collect ThinPrep Pap Test vial contain PreservCyt® Solution commercially available collection device ( broom-type device cytobrush/spatula combination ) may test APTIMA HPV Assay either pre- post-Pap processing . The assay use TIGRIS System PANTHER System . The objective establish APTIMA HPV Assay performance PANTHER System comparable performance TIGRIS System .
